ACTS (8-bit)
0xff = Stage List
0x00 = Act 1
0x01 = Act 2
0x02 = Act 3

STAGES / LANDS (8-bit)
0x00=🌻 Green Hill Zone
0x02=🔥 Marble Zone
0x04=🌳 Spring Yard Zone
0x01=💧 Labyrinth Zone
0x03=🌟 Star Light Zone
0x05=⚙️ Scrap Brain Zone
